reviewText:
This has to be one of the worst movies I've ( tried to or) watched on Amazon. I couldn't possibly list all the flaws of this "film" in one review.
( btw- for those of you like my self who are Sandahl Bergnman stalkers, be advised that even though she's listed as a "star" in this film, her appearance in it, ( like in many others ), amounts to maybe 1/32 of the entire run time.
If you want to see a good horror movie, rent one that was released in the theaters. This was a waste of time.
Alot of suspense and a good movie and liked the actors and actresses and they were great in this movie

This is a great sexual thriller. Lots of good stuff. If you enjoy these its totally worth the price. You can get it cheaper though Amazon's subsidiary CreateSpace: createspace.com/219027  Code: ALLXKLKB for 10% off.

Enjoy!
